ParallelSpider - Class in pSpider
The class that implements the Runnable interface is the one that defines what is to be done by each 'thread' running concurrently.
ParallelSpider(SharedSpiderData) - Constructor for class pSpider.ParallelSpider
Create a new spider with access to the shared data by passing it a reference.
ParallelSpider(SharedSpiderData, String) - Constructor for class pSpider.ParallelSpider
Create a new spider with access to the shared data by passing it a reference.
println(String) - Static method in class pSpider.RunThreadedSpider
I provided this function because students are used to calling println().
processPage(String) - Method in class pSpider.ParallelSpider
Retrieves content from a url and processes that content.
